ingredients.item: leaves from 8 basil sprigs, plus 6 small sprigs to garnish

instructions.step: Pour the tequila, triple sec, sugar syrup and lime juice into a freezeproof container and put in the freezer overnight. (It won’t freeze solid.)

To serve, put the crushed ice in a blender (work in batches if necessary). Add the chilled tequila mixture and basil leaves, then whizz until smooth, green and very thick – you may need to add more ice. Pour into martini glasses, garnish each with a basil sprig and serve immediately.
